__MSG_extensionDescription__.message: Tells the user if the site they're visiting belongs to a trusted domain and can be therefore trusted (e.g. personal information can be entered). This provides an additional security analogue to the https security layer. It just notifies the user if a site participates and is officially approved by the whitelist service it specifies.

notVerified_message.message: The connection to %s is encryted however it does not support secondVerification

canting_message.message: %s requested the determination of its validity but does not appear on the list of the specified service

verifierNotKnown_message.message: The domain %s specified a verifier not on the service whitelist

notSupported_message.message: Support only for encryted connections to websites
